column1: Report title: Homicide Trends in United States
Authors: Erica Smith and Alexia Cooper
Figure 31b. Black victims of family homicides, by relationship, 1980-2008
Note: Percentages are based on the 63.1% of homicides from 1980 through 2008 for which victim/offender relationships were known.
